titleStmt.title: The humble ansvver of the General Councel of officers of the Army, under His Excellencie, Thomas, Lord Fairfax. To the demands of the Honorable the Commons of England, assembled in Parliament, concerning the late securing, or secluding of some Members thereof. Signed, in the name, and by the appointment of the Generall Councell of the officers of the Army. Jo: Rushworth Secr.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
